title: Andrew Bartnik
text: I’m an aspiring Data Scientist currently enrolled in University of California Santa Barbara’s Masters of Environmental Data Science program! I’m broadly interested in topics across a wide range of fields, but I especially gravitate towards the natural sciences. I will be posting my data projects here as I complete them. Thank you for stopping by!
